subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Third-seeded Maria Sharapova returned to the semifinals of the Sony Open in Key Biscayne, Fla., despite a patchy performance, beating Sara Errani, 7-5, 7-5.
snippet: Third-seeded Maria Sharapova returned to the semifinals of the Sony Open in Key Biscayne, Fla., despite a patchy performance, beating Sara Errani, 7-5, 7-5.
